title: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67
medium: Transparent water color and white gouache, some graphite on cream wove paper, printed text and scene (partial) on verso, in color
inscribed:
Upper left, graphite: No 7
Lower center, graphite: 324
description:
Two turtledoves encircled by a wreath of pink roses with green leaves; branches of blue flowers flank the wreath

On verso: part of printed article, Orgine de la Nobi (lité des Francs); part of an advertisement of a ready-made clothes shop

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67.Transparent water color and white gouache, some graphite on cream wove paper, printed text and scene (partial) on verso, in color. Gift of M. Roy Fisher. 1976-105-8.
